question: Na-ê kó-hāng hū-chài tī 2017 nî kah 2018 nî chi-kan, siáⁿ-mih ê sún-sit tō siāng-tōa ê tôaⁿ-tōaⁿ hō͘ chē?
answer: amortization of deferred cash awards deferred cash stock units and performance stock units

question: Tī 2016 nî, só͘-ū 'amortization' siong-koan chi-chū ê chóng-kiōng chi-liâu sī kúi-ā-téng?
Chiah-sī ê 'ch Sol' tsu-liàu lāi-bīn, chi̍t-tang ê sò͘-jī siōng-koân ê sî, hit tang siōng-tōa ê tan-ê tîng-sū sī siáⁿ-mih?
Chiu-ta̍t `amortization of restricted and deferred stock awards` ê nn̄g-tang-nn̄g chìn-chêng, tùi 2016 chì 2018 nî ê kóng-hoat.
answer: Chiu-ta̍t `amortization of restricted and deferred stock awards` tùi 2016 chì 2018 nî, lóng chiah-chi̍t-ê thiah-lōe ê chìn-chêng. I tī 2016 nî sī $509 pah-bān, hiâⁿ kàu 2017 nî ê $474 pah-bān, koh hiâⁿ kàu 2018 nî ê $435 pah-bān.

question: Iûnn-kè 2017 nî chhiau-kòe $600 pah-bān Bí-kim ê só͘-chāi chi̍t lóng, jî-chhiáⁿ koh-chài 2016 chì 2017 nî ê hûi-ióng tō cheng kôan ê lūi-hêng ū siáⁿ kóu?
answer: charges for estimated awards to retirement-eligible employees

question: 2018 nî ê 'tsóng-kè' chiong-liōng lāi, ū put-to-putn kó͘-sǹg hō͘ siū-chèng só͘-iú ióng-iú lí-chu-khó tòe-chū-ê chiàⁿ-chōa chiàm tó͘-chē phiah?
2018 nî 'kî-thâ piàn-tōng hū-lū sêng-pêng' nā hō͘-chòe 10% kē, 2018 nî ê chūng-kè ē piàn-chóan tó-chē?
Tī 2016 chì 2018 lâi kòe, chóng hū chioh ê sîng-pâi tùi 2016 lâi kòe 2018 ê chêng-hêng, kap 'kî-tāi hòan-sîng kòe-ìng chàu-siâⁿ' tī kā chi̍t ê sî-kî ê chêng-hêng ū siau-tè bô? Kè-sòe lí-iû.
answer: Bô, in ê chêng-hêng bô siau-tè. 'Kî-tāi hòan-sîng kòe-ìng chàu-siâⁿ' tùi 2016 nî ($710M) kàu 2017 nî ($694M) kàu 2018 nî ($640M) sī chiân-ài chiân-ài hòe. Hòe-tāi, 'chóng hū' ê chioh tùi 2016 nî ($2183M) kàu 2017 nî ($2251M) liáu-āu, tī 2018 nî ($2021M) chiâⁿ hòe. Tī 2016-2017 nî ê bô-kâng, sī chiap-siok bô siau-tè ê chèng-kì.

question: 2018 nî ê kok-pia̍t hûi-chhā ê sîng-pún hōe-chi̍p, khak-jīn só͘ tâu-kiong ê 'tsóng-kè' sò͘-jī sī ū chèng-khak.
answer: Sī ê, 2018 nî ê 'tsóng-kè' sò͘-jī sī ū chèng-khak. Kok-pia̍t hûi-chhā ê hāng-bo̍k ($669 + $202 + $75 + $435 + $640) ê chi̍t-thê sī $2021, hām 'tsóng-kè' hâng ê sō͘-jī sio-tī-chiap.

question: Koh-mih giâm-chîu ê tiâⁿ-chòe chin tōa ê chi̍t-tang hō͘-siong piàn-tōa (khò sī cheng-ka hō͘-siong chē hō͘-siong kiám-chē) tī sióⁿ-lóng ê kî-kan?
answer: Amortization of deferred cash awards deferred cash stock units and performance stock units ê tiâⁿ-chòe chin tōa ê chi̍t-tang hō͘-siong piàn-tōa, tùi 2017 nî (354M) kiám-chē kàu 2018 nî (202M) kiám-chē 152M. Che sī sióⁿ-lóng ê lūi-hāng tiong siāng tōa ê chi̍t-tang piàn-hòa.
